auth.magicLinkSent: We've sent a magic link to <email></email>. Click the link in the email to sign in.
auth.enterEmail: Enter your email to receive a magic link
auth.noPasswordNeeded: No password needed. We'll send you a secure link.
auth.bySigningIn: By signing in, you agree to our {termsLink} and {privacyLink}
auth.failedMagicLink: Failed to send magic link. Please try again.
auth.poweredBy: A contract negotiation platform powered by {link}

deals.createFirstDeal: Create your first deal room to start negotiating contracts

newDeal.selectContractType: Select a contract type and configure your deal room
newDeal.governingLawExplainer: The governing law affects which clauses are presented and their default options. This choice is final and will apply to the entire agreement.
newDeal.dealNameDescription: A descriptive name to identify this deal
newDeal.yourCompanyDescription: Will be shown to the other party
newDeal.selectOptionsNext: You'll select your preferred options next
newDeal.contractLanguageExplainer: This determines the language of the final contract document. Choose the language both parties will use for the legal text.
newDeal.toUseContract: To use this contract type, you'll need to have it enabled on your account. Get in touch with us and we'll help you get started.

jurisdictions.californiaDescription: U.S. law framework with Silicon Valley standards
jurisdictions.californiaCourt: State and federal courts in San Francisco, California
jurisdictions.englandWalesDescription: English common law, widely used internationally
jurisdictions.englandWalesCourt: Courts of England and Wales, London
jurisdictions.spainDescription: Spanish civil law within EU regulatory framework

dealDetail.noCounterpartyInvited: No counterparty invited yet. Send an invitation to begin negotiation.
dealDetail.completeSelectionsFirst: Complete your selections before inviting the counterparty.

inviteDialog.title: Invite Counterparty
inviteDialog.description: Send an invitation to the other party to begin negotiation.

negotiate.prePopulateDescription: Save time by starting with the other party's choices. You can still adjust any selection before submitting.
negotiate.previousSelectionUnavailable: Your previous selection is not available under {law} law. Please select a different option.
negotiate.priorityDescription: How important is this clause to you?
negotiate.flexibilityDescription: How willing are you to compromise?

toastMessages.bothPartiesSubmitted: Both parties have submitted! Generating compromise suggestions...
toastMessages.prePopulated: Selections pre-populated. Review and adjust as needed.
toastMessages.pleaseSelectAll: Please make selections for all clauses

review.counterProposalsDescription: The other party has proposed alternatives for some clauses. Review and respond below.
review.readyToGenerateDescription: Both parties have submitted their selections. Generate AI-powered compromise suggestions based on priorities and flexibility.
review.selectAlternative: Select an alternative option you'd like to propose:
review.rationalePlaceholder: Explain why you're proposing this alternative...
review.otherPartyProposed: The other party has proposed an alternative:
review.allClausesAgreedDescription: Congratulations! Both parties have agreed on all clauses. Proceed to e-signature.

toastMessages.allAgreedProceeding: All clauses agreed! Proceeding to signing...

signing.allClausesMustBeAgreed: All clauses must be agreed upon by both parties before the contract can be signed.
signing.contractSignedDescription: Both parties have signed. The contract is now legally binding.
signing.waitingForDocument: Waiting for the document to be finalized...
signing.waitingForOtherParty: Waiting for the other party to sign...
signing.typeYourFullName: Type your full legal name below to create your electronic signature
signing.signatureConfirmation: I confirm that I am authorized to sign this contract and that my typed name above constitutes my legal electronic signature with the same validity as a handwritten signature.
signing.readyForSignaturesDescription: All terms have been agreed upon. Start the signing process and both parties can sign by typing their full legal name.
signing.canSignImmediately: You'll be able to sign immediately after starting the process
signing.legalNoticeText: By signing this document electronically, you agree that your electronic signature is the legal equivalent of your manual signature on this agreement. This contract will become legally binding once both parties have signed.

toastMessages.signingStarted: Signing process started. You can now sign below.
